supersolids.SchroedingerMixtureSummary

Numerical solver for non-linear time-dependent Schrodinger equation.

Module Contents

Classes

SchroedingerMixtureSummary

Saves the properties of a Schroedinger system without the arrays,
class supersolids.SchroedingerMixtureSummary.SchroedingerMixtureSummary(SystemMixture)[source]

Saves the properties of a Schroedinger system without the arrays, to save disk space when saving it with dill (pickle).

copy_to(self, SystemMixture)[source]
